author: poojaranjan
content:
Looking into https://github.com/ethereum/RIPs  It seems to be receiving proposals already.
 
In yesterday's EIPIP meeting, we briefly discussed  about the need for RIP editors and Meta proposal to explain the RIP process to make proposals.

 <@550420431744794624> and  <@415548822983278593>  were proposed as editors. May I request to add `rip-editors.yml`  file in the repo to list editors name?
